Producer: Robert Aaronson, Jean-Claude La Marre, Melanie Levostre, Michael Mendelsohn, Eurika Pratts
Synopsis: Michael (Robert Ri'chard) takes a job as an exotic dancer to make ends meet, and as the money rolls in, he has to deal with the attention of the female club goers while hiding his job from his mother (Vivica A. Fox) and girlfriend.
Title: Chocolate City
